00023 #include "xmlattrbcatlist.h"

00028 RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::xmlAttrbCatList::xmlAttrbCatList(){
00029   LOGI("Creates xmlAttrbCatList");
00030   refresh();
00031 
00032 }
00033 
00040 bool RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::xmlAttrbCatList::refresh(){
00041   LOGI("xmlAttrbCatList refresh function called");
00042   bool ret;
00043 
00044   GlobalURI gu;
00045   std::string filename=gu.getXmlAdress("persoattrbcat.xml");
00046 
00047   CurlFileToXml cgf;
00048   cgf.setFilename(filename.c_str());
00049 
00050   bool success= cgf.perform();
00051 
00052   if (success){
00053     loadDocument(&cgf);
00054     ret=true;
00055   }
00056   else{
00057     long resp=cgf.getServerResponse();
00058     LOGW("An error occured while getting xmlAttrbCatList");
00059     cout << "Last server response : " << resp << endl;
00060     correctlyLoaded=false;
00061     ret=false;
00062   }
00063 
00064   return ret;
00065 }

00072 RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::xmlAttrbCatList::~xmlAttrbCatList(){
00073   doc=NULL;
00074   root=NULL;
00075 }
00076 
00087 void RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::xmlAttrbCatList::loadDocument(
00088                                          CurlFileToXml* cgf){
00089 
00090   doc=cgf->getXmlDocument();
00091   if (doc){
00092     root =doc->RootElement();
00093     correctlyLoaded=true;
00094     LOGI("xmlPlayerList correctly loaded"); 
00095   }
00096   else{
00097     correctlyLoaded=false;
00098     LOGW("An error occured while getting xmlPlayerList");
00099   }
00100 }
00101 
00110 RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::tAttrbCatList* RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::
00111                                   xmlAttrbCatList::getAttrbCatList(){
00112 
00113   tAttrbCatList* pl= new tAttrbCatList();
00114 
00115   TiXmlHandle docHandle( doc );
00116   TiXmlElement* child = docHandle.FirstChild( "PersoAttrbCat" )
00117                                   .FirstChild( "Category" ).Element();
00118 
00119   for( child; child; child=child->NextSiblingElement() ){
00120 
00121     tAttrbCatListItem* it=new tAttrbCatListItem();
00122 
00123     it->name= getXMLTextFromName(child, "Name");
00124     it->desc= getXMLTextFromName(child, "Desc");
00125     it->tab= getXMLTextFromName(child, "Tab");
00126 
00127     pl->push_back(it);
00128   }
00129   return pl;
00130 }
00131 
00143 const char* RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::xmlAttrbCatList::
00144                 getXMLTextFromName(TiXmlElement*child, const char* nodeName){
00145 
00146   TiXmlText* textNode;
00147 
00148   TiXmlNode* node=child->FirstChild(nodeName);
00149   if (node && node->FirstChild()){
00150     textNode=node->FirstChild()->ToText();
00151     if (textNode)
00152       return  textNode->Value();
00153     
00154     else  // !textNode
00155       return  "";
00156   }
00157   else    // !node
00158     return  "";
00159 }
00160 
00168 RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::tAttrbCatListItem* RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::
00169               xmlAttrbCatList::getAttrbCat(const char* catName){
00170 
00171   bool found=false;
00172 
00173   tAttrbCatList::const_iterator iter;
00174 
00175   tAttrbCatList* pl=this->getAttrbCatList();
00176   
00177   if (pl){
00178     for (iter=pl->begin(); iter != pl->end(); iter++){
00179 
00180       // We have the good category
00181       if (strcmp(catName, (*iter)->name )==0){
00182         found=true;
00183         return (*iter);
00184 
00185       }
00186     }
00187   }
00188 
00189   if (!found)
00190     return NULL;
00191 }
